content.equation_data: If <fmath alttext="\cot θ (1 + sin θ)  = 4m" class="fm-inline"><mrow><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mi class="ma-repel-adj" mathvariant="normal">cot</mi><mspace style="margin-right: 0.17em; padding-right: 0.001em; visibility: hidden;" width=".17em">‌</mspace><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mo class="fm-mo-Luc">(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo class="fm-infix">+</mo><mrow><mrow><mrow><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">s</mi><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">i</mi></mrow><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">n</mi></mrow><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo class="fm-mo-Luc">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo class="fm-infix-loose">=</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">m</mi></mrow></mrow></fmath> and <fmath alttext="\cot θ(1- \sin θ) = 4n" class="fm-inline"><mrow><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mi class="ma-repel-adj" mathvariant="normal">cot</mi><mspace style="margin-right: 0.17em; padding-right: 0.001em; visibility: hidden;" width=".17em">‌</mspace><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mo class="fm-mo-Luc">(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo class="fm-infix">−</mo><mrow class="ma-repel-adj"><mi class="ma-repel-adj" mathvariant="normal">sin</mi><mspace style="margin-right: 0.17em; padding-right: 0.001em; visibility: hidden;" width=".17em">‌</mspace><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo class="fm-mo-Luc">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo class="fm-infix-loose">=</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi class="fm-mi-length-1" mathvariant="italic">n</mi></mrow></mrow></fmath>, then which one of the following is correct ?
